nodes.text: The Chargona campaign was a battle that involved the Rebel Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry sometime by the year 3 ABY during the reign of the Galactic Empire. When the 61st left the planet Haidoral Prime aboard the CR90 corvette Thunderstrike that year, veterans of the Chargona campaign passed around rumors of a coming last stand against a blockade of Star Destroyers on the edge of the Mid Rim, which were overheard by the rebel sergeant Hazram Namir.
The Chargona campaign was mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
